name: Wrath of a King by SilkSwati

metadata.name: Wrath of a King #1
metadata.description:
If you talk about something being special and near to your heart then ‘Wrath of a King' is the very first from my 'The Hunger Games Trilogy’ series and my very first wildlife trip to Masai Mara. 

Why Hunger Games? Because it's wildlife and just like in real life, whether you like it or not it's the survival of the fastest.
